themes: perceived bias in grant review process
key_phrases: deep concern regarding the review process and the panel members
the review process extremely biased and reveals a significant lack of impartiality
reviewers assessing our application claimed there was a lack of information, despite the fact that the requested details were clearly and explicitly provided
did not meet her personal 'holistic' requirements
raises serious questions about the objectivity and fairness of the evaluation process
subjective assessment not only deviates from the established guidelines
formally requesting that our application undergoes a re-evaluation by a panel of unbiased reviewers
imperative that the review process be conducted in a fair and transparent manner
restore trust in its processes and provide equitable opportunities for all applicants
mentioned_programs: Cultural Funding Team at the City of Austin Economic Development Department (Cultural Arts Division)
barriers_identified: lack of impartiality among panel members
deviation from established grant evaluation guidelines
solutions_proposed: re-evaluation by a panel of unbiased reviewers
conducting the review process in a fair and transparent manner
